whole_business_summaries.Mostly Responding: Your business is in a rebuilding or early-stage phase. Let's focus on stabilizing core systems.
whole_business_summaries.Mix of Responding and Building: You've built a partial foundation. We'll work on strengthening weak spots and building consistency.
whole_business_summaries.Mostly Building: You have a solid operational base. Now is the time to systematize and prepare for growth.
whole_business_summaries.Mix of Building and Optimizing: Your systems are functioning well. You're ready to refine, delegate, and focus on strategic growth.
whole_business_summaries.Mostly Optimizing: Your business is highly structured and ready for next-level opportunities, innovation, or scaling.
